- Previous submission year: 1992

- Row 2, Year (ceremony): 2008
- Row 1, Year (ceremony): 1992

Looking at the submission years: 1992, 2008, 2010, 2012, 2013. The earliest possible 11-year window would be from 2008 to 2019 (though our latest is 2013). Let's see how many films fall into that: 2008, 2010, 2012, 2013—that's four films. Not five.

Alternatively, maybe the user meant that in an 11-year span starting from a certain point, but even then, I don't see five submissions within any consecutive 11 years based on the given data. The maximum number of submissions in any 11-year window here is four (2008-2019), which isn't five.
